title: Lost chest and a key :) what is this?
body:
I opened chest and i didnt get anything,so i relogged and my chest and key was gone.
Can someone help?

replies.body:
I went ahead and looked at your Hextech crafting history and it looks like the last chest you opened gave you some orange essence and an Icon. It can be a little confusing because the icons you receive from hextech don't ever go into your crafting loot inventory. They actually go straight into your profile icon list. 

If you still aren't seeing your new icon, reach out to us in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and we'll be able to go over everything with you there!
